pages.text: The Pedestal is a decorative blocks that acts as an item display.$(br2)You can place objects on there right clicking in one while you are holding an item in your hand.$(br2)It will also display an item's custom name if it has one.
Insert a picture of Pedestal Items like Tridents, End Crystals and Swords display differently on pedestals and observers can detect when an item is taken from a pedestal.
